# ⚠️ LEGACY FOLDER - NOT USED

This folder contains **old versions** of CSS files that are **NO LONGER REFERENCED** by `index.html`.

`/assets/styles.css`

## This Folder Contains:

**Do not edit files in this folder.** They are kept for historical reference only.
